name: THE CARNIVAL OF DEFORMITY
description:
Have you ever been to the carnival of deformity?

It is located deep in the forest, far away from the rest of society. It holds secrets of the past. 

The exhibits are fascinating, they have a lot of things to tell you. They talk about the things we have long lost. Isn't that interesting? 

We do encourage you to interact with them, but do be careful. They are "defective" after all. Who knows...you might just get infected. 

Would be a shame, wouldn't it? 

DEVELOPERS:
